articles.title: ESA - How MIRI became Webb's coolest instrument - European Space Agency
articles.description: The NASA/ESA/CSA James Webb Space Telescope is widely referred to as the successor to the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope. In reality, it is the successor to a lot more than that. With the inclusion of the Mid-InfraRed Instrument (MIRI), Webb also became a su…

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: ‘Blood moon’ total lunar eclipse to arrive on Tuesday - The Guardian
articles.description: Total eclipse to be visible in North America, Asia and the Pacific, but Africa, Middle East and Europe will have to wait until 2025
articles.content:
The moon is set to pull off a disappearing act on Tuesday, and those who miss it will have to wait three years for another chance to see something like it again.
